author: xtqqczze
body:
> @iSazonov Perhaps we could add `-SkipAnalyzers` switch parameter to `Start-PSBuild`?

Good point.

_Originally posted by @iSazonov in https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/14336#issuecomment-749320265_
